services.title: Graphic Design
services.description: Leveraging state-of-the-art tools like DALLâ€¢E 3, Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, Midjourney, and Procreate, I offer premium graphic design services. My expertise extends to crafting custom merchandise such as shirts, hoodies, doormats, notebooks, bookmarks, and stickers. My approach combines creativity with cutting-edge technology, ensuring unique, visually striking designs that stand out in today's dynamic market.

services.title: QA Testing

aboutpara: My extensive knowledge in graphic design, paired with a diverse skill set that ranges from programming to cryptocurrency technologies, allows me to approach challenges holistically, fostering creativity and innovation in every project. During my academic journey at the University of Montevallo, not only did I earn accolades such as making the Dean's List and the President's List, but I also delved deep into astrophysics data analysis. By leveraging Python, NumPy, and Jupyter Notebook, I successfully identified 17 habitable exoplanets from NASA's expansive Kepler dataset. This endeavor showcases my analytical capabilities, curiosity, and ability to extract meaningful insights from vast data pools. My entrepreneurial spirit is evident through my ventures like KingzmanCo, where I marry the worlds of graphic design and technology to offer cutting-edge products. Leading this endeavor has honed my skills in trend analysis, customer engagement, and business management. Furthermore, my role at King&King Enterprises gave me a front-row seat to the world of cryptocurrency, where I ensured the seamless operation of mining machines and managed financial disbursements with precision. What truly sets me apart is my proficiency in a wide array of programming languages and tools. From developing a Go-Buffalo-based URL shortener to creating user-centric applications using Blazor and React, I constantly challenge myself to stay ahead of the curve. I take pride in my ability to bring ideas to life, and my projects, such as the real-time weather app or the comprehensive expense tracker, are a testament to this passion and capability. Joining your company is not just an opportunity for career advancement, but a chance to contribute to a forward-thinking team, bringing in fresh perspectives and innovative solutions. I believe my diverse experience, hands-on approach, and unwavering commitment to excellence make me a unique and valuable asset to your organization.

resume.tagline: I'm a graphic designer, software developer, data analyst, and prompt engineer
resume.description: Innovative Graphic Designer with a robust academic foundation in computer informatics and hands-on experience in graphic design, full-stack development, cryptocurrency technologies, as well asdatabase management. Known for my problem-solving skills, ability to tackle complex challenges, and commitment to team success. I'll start wherever I have to start. I'll park cars if I have to. The biggest part of judging character is knowing yourself, and I know this: I can do this job, I can. Give me a chance, I won't let you down.
